layman_description: How many degrees of rotation the weapon swing covers.
technical_description: Angular sweep magnitude for melee attack hit detection volumes.
player_impact: Determines how wide your melee attacks are.

layman_description: The beginning of the attack arc that counts as a glancing blow instead of a hit.
technical_description: Lower bound for directional damage mitigation in attack sequence.
player_impact: Attacks at this angle do reduced damage.

layman_description: The end of the attack arc where glancing blows stop counting.
technical_description: Upper bound for directional damage mitigation in attack sequence.
player_impact: Attacks beyond this angle do full damage again.

layman_description: This item only appears from special loot tables, never from common containers.
technical_description: Restricts item to unique or rare loot pool spawning mechanisms.
player_impact: Makes finding this item more rewarding and less common.

layman_description: How much faster you gain repair skill when fixing this item.
technical_description: Experience multiplier for skill advancement during item restoration.
player_impact: Repairing this item trains skills more efficiently.

layman_description: The 3D model shown when this item is lying on the ground.
technical_description: Asset reference for item world state visual representation.
player_impact: Affects how items look when dropped or placed on the ground.

layman_description: How long it takes to scrap this item for parts at a salvage station.
technical_description: Custom duration for item breaking down in crafting stations.
player_impact: Some items scrap faster than others, saving you time.

layman_description: What types of ammunition this magazine or container can hold.
technical_description: Whitelist of compatible ammunition item entities for container loading.
player_impact: Determines which ammo you can load into this magazine.

layman_description: Random items that might come with this item when you use it.
technical_description: Loot pool references for stochastic item generation on activation.
player_impact: Using this item might give you bonus random items.

layman_description: How many random bonus items you might get.
technical_description: Quantity range for random loot distribution on use.
player_impact: The bonus items vary in number each time you use it.

layman_description: The basic shape of this block (cube, slope, water, terrain, decorative).
technical_description: Geometry classification enum determining collision and rendering type.
player_impact: Affects how blocks stack and collide with players and projectiles.

layman_description: Whether water can flow through or off this block.
technical_description: Water interaction flags for environmental simulation.
player_impact: Determines if water gets stuck or flows away.

layman_description: Whether this block supports other blocks above it or adds structural integrity.
technical_description: Boolean flag enabling stability contribution calculations.
player_impact: Some blocks are weak and collapse easily without support.

layman_description: Where the visual model of this block is positioned relative to its grid location.
technical_description: 3D coordinate offset for model-to-collision alignment.
player_impact: Makes blocks align properly with terrain and other blocks.

layman_description: How much light this block blocks (how dark of a shadow it creates).
technical_description: Light attenuation factor for environment illumination calculations.
player_impact: Affects brightness inside buildings and shadows around blocks.

layman_description: Where on your body this armor or clothing item fits (head, chest, hands, feet).
technical_description: Character body part enum for equipment slot assignment.
player_impact: Determines what protection you get from wearing this item.

layman_description: Which outfit set this armor piece belongs to for matching bonuses.
technical_description: Enum reference for armor stat aggregation and visual consistency.
player_impact: Wearing complete outfit sets gives you bonus stats.

layman_description: What body parts this item covers and prevents other items from using.
technical_description: Body part exclusion list for equipment slot conflict resolution.
player_impact: Some armor pieces prevent you from wearing other items together.

layman_description: Where on the character model this item attaches visually.
technical_description: Skeletal bone reference for item positioning during wear.
player_impact: Determines where your armor and clothes appear on your character.

layman_description: How this headgear interacts with your character's hair (full mask, hat, bald).
technical_description: Hair visibility override enum for cosmetic model rendering.
player_impact: Some helmets hide your hair completely, others just sit on top.
